mapper.select:
SELECT seq as seq, ani as ani, description as description, connid as connid, bl_useyn as bl_useyn, agentid as agentid, agentname as agentname, degree as degree, comp_cd as comp_cd, crt_dt as crt_dt, crt_by as crt_by, upt_dt as upt_dt, upt_by as upt_by FROM gsivr.ax_ivr_blackconsumer WHERE 1=1
AND comp_cd = #{comp_cd}
AND ani LIKE '%' || #{ani} || '%'
ORDER BY seq desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gsivr.ax_ivr_blackconsumer (seq, ani, description, connid, bl_useyn, agentid, agentname, degree, comp_cd, crt_dt, crt_by) VALUES (gsivr.seq_ax_ivr_blackconsumer.nextval, #{ani}, #{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{connid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bl_useyn}, #{agentid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{degree}, #{comp_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crt_dt}, #{crt_by})
mapper.update: UPDATE gsivr.ax_ivr_blackconsumer SET description = #{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, connid = #{connid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bl_useyn = #{bl_useyn}, agentid = #{agentid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agentname = #{agentname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comp_cd = #{comp_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, degree = #{degree}, upt_dt = #{upt_dt}, upt_by = #{upt_by} WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT code as code, name as name FROM ax_common_code_m WHERE group_cd = 'RECORD'
